casebody.data:
Earnest W. FULLBRIGHT and Cullen, Allas Curlin, Powers, Appellants, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 6192. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 21, 1931. Robert H. Smith, Jr., of Atlanta, Ga., for appellants. W. A. Bootle, U. S. Atty., and Fred W. New, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Macon, Ga.

Before. BRYAN, SIBLEY, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
